name: Mattr Corp.
longDescription: Shawcor Ltd is an energy services company. The company's segments include Pipeline and Pipe Services, Composite Systems and Automotive and Industrial serving various sectors of the Infrastructure, Energy and Transportation markets. The firm operates through a global network of fixed and mobile manufacturing and service facilities and is valued for its integrity, technology, and capability to execute complex projects.
